Did you miss our T Levels awareness webinar last week? If you want to catch up, this recording is now available on our YouTube channel, so check it out when you can!
Fabulous work everyone!
We wish you a happy holiday season and look forward to seeing you on our return on 3 January.

A big thank you to all the providers who are delivering T Levels, those who have engaged with us on the 12-month countdown while preparing to deliver from 2023 and to the employers who have worked with us as part of EIBs and on validation activities! 

See you in January!

#TLevelsApproval and Support Webinars: 
We are now inviting providers to register for our approval webinar, which will be held in two parts. These webinars are for those involved in the planning and delivery of T Levels from September 2023. 
Join us:http://ow.ly/MGVf50M1XT1

Our Chief Executive@K_DonnellyCEOshares her thoughts following yesterday’s@commonsPACreport which found that participation in skills programmes has fallen, especially among older workers and in poorer areas.

How can L&D professionals ensure programmes are set up for success and deliver real value to businesses? Read our latest@PeopleMgtarticle with top tips:https://bit.ly/3G5hS7SWhich tip is best for embedding quality in training and driving better ROI?

City & Guilds are developing a T Level Agriculture, Environment and Animal Care Technical Qualification (TQ), which has two pathways. Find out more about how this qualification is structured and the two pathways available:http://ow.ly/i1zE50LTK16

The festive season can be challenging for people living with bipolar.

Want to support, visit:http://ow.ly/kNTX50M24K9

Yesterday our President, Her Royal Highness The Princess Royal, presented 46 UK organisations with their#PrincessRoyalTrainingAwardsduring a special ceremony at Banqueting House, recognising their outstanding commitment to workplace training and development.@RoyalFamily

Recently, our President, HRH The Princess Royal, opened one of our centres in the Falklands. 

Falklands College will play an important role in the region, providing qualifications ranging from care to construction.http://ow.ly/3nei50LW3Gs

We offer#mathsandenglishqualifications from Entry Level through to Levels 1 and 2, with digital teaching resources to help individuals develop the vital skills and qualities they need to progress in learning and in life. Learn more about our full offer:http://ow.ly/4SwM50LFKUv

Do you want to optimise your training investment? 

Our Assured Service can help you to achieve your skills 
development and business goals:http://ow.ly/zC0S50LPMPQ

City & Guilds are running a#TLevelsawareness webinar!

This session is for new providers wanting a high-level overview of T Level programmes offered by City & Guilds. It will benefit providers who intend to deliver T Levels in the future.http://ow.ly/cRJl50LTwpE

Young people believe the Government can do more to support them. 

We are calling on the Government to optimise existing skills interventions and improve careers guidance and education from early years through to adulthood.  

Read more:https://bit.ly/3VUeAcU#YouthMisspent

Thanks to@BBCPoliticsfor inviting our CEO@K_DonnellyCEOon today's show to discuss our#YouthMisspentresearch and why so many young people feel excluded from the labour market.Watch the recording back -starts at 26 minutes 12 seconds.#PoliticsLivehttps://bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/m001fyyl/politics-live-07122022…

Only 23% of young people feel they have the skills they need. 

Find out what the jobs market looks like from the perspective of the UK’s youth in our#YouthMisspentreport. 

Read the full reporthttps://bit.ly/3VUeAcU

Our new research indicates high youth unemployment is set to stay as a shocking 9% of young people currently studying or out of work say they never intend to start working – that’s 227,000 people in the UK. 

Read our full reporthttps://bit.ly/3VUeAcU#YouthMisspent

Young people seem to be rapidly losing hope as they face what they see as a hostile labour market with limited opportunities to get a foot on the ladder and progress. 

Read our#YouthMisspentreport recommendations herehttps://bit.ly/3VUeAcU

What are the challenges facing young people in today's job market? And how do we fix them? 

Join our#YouthMisspentlaunch event at 10 am to find out. 

With insights from@MagriniElena@Lightcast_UK,@ljrawlings@YEUK2012,@SpartaGlobaland@k_donnellyCEO.

Our#YouthMisspentresearch revealed 13% of 18-24-years old are unemployed or not in education and a further 3% are economically inactive. 

Yet there are 1.3 million open vacancies in the UK. Why? 

Join our event for more insights and solutions. Register
Hashtags: #YouthMisspent, Register now! Join our virtual #YouthMisspent launch event

Text: @mrsangovePEThank you for your message and interest, you can conduct a search for your nearest  centre at the top of the following page:https://cityandguilds.comKind regards City & Guilds

This@Telegrapharticle reports the results from our#YouthMisspentresearch uncovering the harsh realities for Britain’s young people in today’s job market. Read more:https://telegraph.co.uk/news/2022/12/07/nearly-one-10-young-people-never-intend-start-working/…

Seize your last opportunity to take part in our#NeurodiversityIndexReport.

Are you currently delivering one of our#TLevels? Our Technical Advisors are hosting support events via MS Teams. So, if you have a question, need support, or would like to speak to other providers, please join us!
Register now:http://ow.ly/cjZ350LTgj8

Calling all young carers and young adult carers!

Fill in Carers Trust's survey to help them influence decision-makers and help them think of new ways of supporting young carers and young adult carers like you.

Take the surveyhttps://forms.office.com/r/YyrPrwm1Nd#YoungCarersActionDay

The City & Guilds Level 2 Award in Retrofit enables learners to obtain knowledge on the essential topic areas related to building retrofitting, which is becoming increasingly important today as so many homes face fuel poverty.#FuelPoverty@NEA_UKCharityhttp://bit.ly/3XSTddO

Tomorrow is International Day of Persons with Disabilities.

To celebrate, we're highlighting the work of our disability community support group. 

A colleague-led members group that we are proud to inform has supported and empowered members for the past year.#IDPwD

Today we launch our#YouthMisspentreport with findings from 5,000 18-24-year-olds in the UK and labour market data from @Lightcast_UK. 

The research has uncovered some stark results. 13% of young people are unemployed, with a further 3% economically inactive. Read more

Tomorrow we launch our#YouthMisspentreport, which polled 5,000 18-24-year-olds in the UK. We've uncovered some bleak findings on the experiences and aspirations of young people in today's job market. Come to our event on 12 Dec as we unpack the challenges and offer solutions.

Youth unemployment remains a serious ongoing problem in the UK. 

How can employers, Government and educators better support young people to enter the labour market? 

Join our#YouthMisspentevent as we explore the solutions to this critical issue. 

Click below to register.

Great to see William Vereker of@santanderukhighlight the importance of skills and call for a plan driven by cross-party collaboration echoing recommendations by our Chief Executive@K_DonnellyCEOSantander received a#PrincessRoyalTrainingAwardin 2020http://ow.ly/ANOF50LVC0w

In the run up to this year’s#PrincessRoyalTrainingAwardsceremony, we’re celebrating@TP_plc, a trailblazer for the Learn and Earn Apprenticeship Scheme in the construction sector. Find out how they’re tackling diversity challenges in the industry here:https://princessroyaltrainingawards.com/project/travis-perkins-plc/…

What a way to spend the afternoon - celebrating our people!

Today our Chair and Executive team shared their standout moments and teams, highlighting some of our unsung heroes. The celebration ended by confirming our#AmpersandAward2022 finalists

Congrats all!#endofyear
